about_the_game:
To win the race, you need to bring your game to the next level. And with the new Super Dealership module, you have not 1 but 3 levels to choose from! But be careful when you pick the one to land on. A mobile ramp will fly you to a different level of the module, activating a special effect indicated on the side of the building ... and not all of them will work to your advantage! Super-speed or slow effect? Your timing will decide the assigned effect and the fate of the race! It's time to take on the challenge and fly to the finish line! Add the Super Dealership module to your collection and create even more fun and unpredictable tracks!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 3
detailed_description:
To win the race, you need to bring your game to the next level. And with the new Super Dealership module, you have not 1 but 3 levels to choose from! But be careful when you pick the one to land on. A mobile ramp will fly you to a different level of the module, activating a special effect indicated on the side of the building ... and not all of them will work to your advantage! Super-speed or slow effect? Your timing will decide the assigned effect and the fate of the race! It's time to take on the challenge and fly to the finish line! Add the Super Dealership module to your collection and create even more fun and unpredictable tracks!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Wanna bring your race to the next level? With Super Dealership, you have not 1 but 3 levels to choose from! Jump off the mobile ramp and land on the best floor to activate the coolest special effect!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
